thread.title: Closest to Main Attractions !!
thread.title_full: Closest to Main Attractions !! - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Omair R
title: Closest to Main Attractions !!
text:
Visited Londom for the Sleing break with 2 kids. Stayed 3 nights in a premium room with two beds. Did not get any view but the location was superb. The staff is super friendly. Felicia at the front desk was an Angel. The hotel is practically under the London Eye and got a back door to walk right into it. A lot of fellow American visitors also. They got a library on the ground floor where they serve the high tea and it's a great place to take pictures capturing the Big Ben. Shrek's Adventure and Sealife Aquarium are next door and are very good too.
The rooms are not large but comfy. Only drawback was the the cleaning crew started banging adjacent doors early am and started cleaning. The noise woke up the kids two days in a row. Also, the double bed rooms are practically half a Mike away from the elevators. Still a good experience and will visit again. The in-room dining was very good and the service gets 5
